name: Angular Love
description:
Entry for Brackeys Game Jam #2 (Theme: Love is Blind)

Controls:

-Click the green and pink blocks to rotate them.

-Click the number on top of the screen to create a new pointer piece. Rotate it with right click and place with left click.

-Click and drag to move the map around.

-Press play when you're ready!

Created by Henri Huhtala
